NanoBanana.name: NB - Product Hero
NanoBanana.input1: Hero shot of a single product with clean gradients and dramatic lighting. Emphasize silhouette and glossy highlights.
NanoBanana.input2: High-res, studio quality, subtle rim light

NanoBanana.name: NB - Scene Builder
NanoBanana.input1: Cinematic scene, add depth, foreground interest, layered composition. Encourage narrative details.
NanoBanana.input2: Use cinematic color grading, soft volumetric light

NanoBanana.name: NB - Character Mood
NanoBanana.input1: Character portrait with strong mood, expressive lighting, defined shadows.
NanoBanana.input2: Add emotion cues: eyes, posture, atmosphere
